Title: Paddington
Overview: A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a new home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he meets the kindly Brown family.
Keywords: england, train station, based on novel, bear, anthropomorphism, talking to animals, children's book
production_companies: The Weinstein Company, StudioCanal, TF1 Films Production, Canal+, Heyday Films, Ciné+, Anton Capital Entertainment (ACE), TF1, Amazon Prime Instant Video
Cast: Nicole Kidman, Peter Capaldi, Ben Whishaw
